name: io.github.verygoodplugins/mcp-freescout
description: MCP server for FreeScout helpdesk ticket management and workflow automation. Analyze tickets, manage responses, and integrate with Git workflows.

tools.name: freescout_get_ticket
tools.description: Fetch a FreeScout ticket by ID or URL

tools.name: freescout_analyze_ticket
tools.description: Analyze ticket to determine issue type and solution

tools.name: freescout_search_tickets
tools.description: Search tickets by query and filters

tools.name: git_create_worktree
tools.description: Create Git worktree for ticket work

tools.name: github_create_pr
tools.description: Create GitHub PR for ticket branch
